About Me

I am studying informatics at the Ionian University. I am aspiring to learn as much as possible about what Computations are, the Processing of Information, and to become an expert Programmer. All in all i strive so that at the time this experience is over, i will know deeply about information theory, networks and every other interesting aspect of computers.

Experience

Oblix

Commis Waiter

July 2017 - October 2017

London

Oblix is a sophisticated restaurant with an incredible view as it is housed in The Shard, the tallest building in London.

As a commis waiter i had the responsibility of serving food to the tables, cleaning and setting them up, taking care of the tables and making sure everyone had a pleasant time. Other responsibilities included taking orders, serving drinks and assisting as needed on the floor.

Education

Informatics

2016 -- Currently

Corfu

I am studying Informatics to aquire a B.S. degree and learn all the core concepts about how Databases, Operating Systems, Computer Networks and Computer Programming works. We are also being taught about the importance of Teamwork, working with tight Deadlines and Managing Projects.

The course also tought me about how computer graphics work, what is and how to use information retrieval techniques, machine learning and pattern recognition and lastly about virtual worlds and entertainment software.
